mapper.select: select count(1) from homework where stuid=#{stuid}
mapper.update: update homework set score=#{score},state=1 where id=#{id}
update homework set evaluate=#{evaluate},proposal=#{proposal} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into homework(studentname, classname, stuid, paperid, cqanswer, cpanswer, dpanswer, jqanswer, apanswer,state,dotype) values (#{studentname},#{classname} ,#{stuid} ,#{paperid} ,#{cqanswer} ,#{cpanswer} ,#{dpanswer} ,#{jqanswer} ,#{apanswer},0,#{dotype});
mapper.select: select * from homework where dpanswer like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or apanswer like concat('%',#{keywords},'%')
